name: Dice Crawler (M3G4M4R7)
description:
Dice Crawler is a blend between a ShootEm'Up and a platformer where the Goal Is to beat the Evil Dice using randomized abilities.

Side note: hugging walls and jumping allows you to jump even in midair.

Credit to https://opengameart.org/users/emcee-flesher for the assets we used.
